content.question: In the third sentence of the fourth paragraph, the author mentions the number of swimmers treated by the Spanish Red Cross primarily to

choices.label: amplify her point about the dangers posed by jellyfish to humans
argue that jellyfish along the Costa Brava are more toxic than those in the Philippines
suggest that humans have become more susceptible to jellyfish toxin in recent years
urge her audience to seek medical attention if they are stung by jellyfish

content.answer: amplify her point about the dangers posed by jellyfish to humans

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
